item.title: Now, enjoy a helicopter ride during Raichur Zilla Utsav
item.description:
<![CDATA[Citizens of Raichur will be able to see the city from the sky as a helicopter ride service has been introduced as part of Raichur Zilla Utsav.
The district administration, Zilla Panchayat, City Corporation and the Kannada and Culture Department are jointly organizing the Raichur District Utsav 2026 on the campus of the University of Agricultural Sciences (UAS) Raichur from February Thursday to Saturday. However, the helicopter rides will be available till Monday.
The city has historical forts ...]]>
